name: DigiBuild
headline: We buy & track building materials for construction companies.
description:
Our platform fixes construction's broken supply chain. 70% of construction projects finish late or over budget; procuring and managing building materials is the number 1 reason why. 

We use LLMs to buy and manage building materials for large construction companies.
With DigiBuild, construction contractors can find, order, track and manage their materials from the supplier to the job site. We help customers save money, staff time, and improve construction project schedules.

We work with the top real estate developers, general contractors, and subcontractors in the US. We manage billions in building material volume annually in the 2nd largest market in the world.

founders.name: Robert Salvador, Founder
founders.description:
- CEO of DigiBuild: The trusted Supply Chain software for the Construction industry
- Founder & Fmr. President of a commercial construction company, $500M in projects managed.
- Tech Advisor FL Governor Ron DeSantis
- Bitcoin & Crypto since 2016. Educator & researcher
- Seen on Fox News, NBC, CNBC
-Backed by: YC, Draper Associates, Valhalla Ventures, Picus Cap, Bluefield Capital, Cathexis Ventures, Harvard

# Technology Powered Service and Automation to Revolutionize Your Construction Supply Chain
[ DISCOVER DIGIBUILD ](https://digibuild.com/<>)
# Software to Revolutionize Your Construction Projects, Profits and People
[ DISCOVER DIGIBUILD ](https://digibuild.com/<>)
## DigiBuild the Trusted Material Management and Procurement Software for Builders
## DigiBuild the Trusted Material Management and Procurement Software for Builders
## On average construction projects are **80% over budget** and **20 months behind schedule**.The number one reason is supply chain and material management issues.
Since 2020, **material prices are 20% more expensive and lead times 50% longer**.Material management and procurement is a business risk that cannot be ignored.
**DigiBuild** automates the painstaking process of finding, ordering, tracking, and managingmaterials. 
Our frictionless service that incorporates artificial intelligence helps contractors reduce labor hours, save money on material, reduce schedule delays, and captures important data. 
On average construction projects are **80% over budget** and **20 months behind schedule**.
The number one reason is supply chain and material management issues.
Since 2020, **material prices are 20% more expensive and lead times 50% longer**.Material management and procurement is a business risk that cannot be ignored.
**DigiBuild** automates the painstaking process of finding, ordering, tracking, and managingmaterials. Our easy to use software helps contractors reduce labor hours, save money on material, reduce schedule delays, and captures important data.
### Material Visibility From Order to Jobsite
Single dashboard and audit trail for each transaction and Supplier from order to delivery and creates unprecedented visibility for Owners, GCs or Subcontractors.
[ Learn More ](https://digibuild.com/<https:/digibuild.com/products/digiprocure/>)
### Reduce Material Procurement Hours & Prices
Cut material management time IN HALF. Upload a drawing set and job schedule and we provide a material takeoff, 10 material suppliers, free quotes, and Predictive Scheduling tools.
[ Learn More ](https://digibuild.com/<https:/digibuild.com/products/digiprocure/>)
### Prevent Scheduling Misses
Predictive Scheduling reduces 90% of misses by producing “Must Order by Dates” that guarantees contractors have the material they need on time to meet their job schedules.
[ Learn More ](https://digibuild.com/<https:/digibuild.com/products/digiprocure/>)
### More Effective Project Managers
Reduce tasks and time by automating paperwork, contracts and streamlining payments. Capture material management and procurement data to improve company wide processes.
[ Learn More ](https://digibuild.com/<https:/digibuild.com/products/digiendeavour/>)
### Material Visibility From Order to Jobsite
Single dashboard and audit trail for each transaction and Supplier from order to delivery and creates unprecedented visibility for Owners, GCs or Subcontractors.
[ Learn More ](https://digibuild.com/<https:/digibuild.com/products/digiprocure/>)
### Reduce Material Procurement Hours & Prices
Cut material management time IN HALF. Upload a drawing set and job schedule and we provide a material takeoff, 10 material suppliers, free quotes, and Predictive Scheduling tools.
[ Learn More ](https://digibuild.com/<https:/digibuild.com/products/digiprocure/>)
### Prevent Scheduling Misses
Predictive Scheduling reduces 90% of misses by producing “Must Order by Dates” that guarantees contractors have the material they need on time to meet their job schedules.
[ Learn More ](https://digibuild.com/<https:/digibuild.com/products/digiprocure/>)
### More Effective Project Managers
Reduce tasks and time by automating paperwork, contracts and streamlining payments. Capture material management and procurement data to improve company wide processes.
[ Learn More ](https://digibuild.com/<https:/digibuild.com/products/digiendeavour/>)

generated_description:
DigiBuild is on a mission to cut through the chaos that often plagues the construction supply chain—a sector where a staggering 70% of projects run late or over budget, primarily due to inefficient management of building materials. Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, the Miami-based company leverages machine learning to help construction contractors buy, track, and manage materials seamlessly from suppliers to job sites.

At its core, DigiBuild simplifies a historically cumbersome process. Through its platform, construction companies can efficiently find, order, and manage materials, ultimately saving them both time and money while improving project timelines. In a market where material costs have skyrocketed—up 20% since 2020—and lead times have extended by 50%, this kind of efficiency is not just nice to have; it’s necessary.

DigiBuild works with some of the leading real estate developers, general contractors, and subcontractors across the U.S., managing billions in materials annually in the world's second-largest construction market. With a compact team of 15, DigiBuild focuses on providing tools that enhance material visibility and streamline procurement. Their offerings include DigiProcure and DigiEndeavour, tailored solutions that cut material procurement hours in half and automate many of the tedious tasks project managers face.

The challenge in construction isn’t just about getting the right materials; it’s about preventing delays and ensuring that projects stay on budget. DigiBuild addresses these needs with predictive scheduling features that flag key ordering dates and help avoid mismanagement.

For those interested in learning more, whether you're a contractor looking for a competitive edge or a stakeholder aiming to better understand the supply chain, you can explore DigiBuild’s offerings on their [website](https://digibuild.com). They are bridging gaps in an industry that desperately needs it—one project at a time.
